thread.title: Pamela Anderson may be dating Julian Assange because, of course, it's 2017
thread.title_full: Pamela Anderson may be dating Julian Assange because, of course, it's 2017

author: Jenna Clarke
title: Pamela Anderson may be dating Julian Assange because, of course, it's 2017
text:
Pamela Anderson delivers lunch to Julian Assange at Embassy of Ecuador late last year. Photo: Ben A. Pruchnie 
"I really believe in him and think he's a good person, and I'm concerned about his health, his family, and I just hope that by some miracle he's set free." 
Like odd pairings that have come before them, the rumoured couple may have more in common than meets the eye. Photo gallery Odd celebrity couples 
Both have enjoyed the support of Russia. In 2010 Vladimir Putin claimed that the rape charges Assange is facing in Sweden are politically motivated . Meanwhile Anderson has attended events in Russia and had an audience with Putin's former chief-of-staff Sergei Ivanov to discuss wildlife conservation. 
She has even started tweeting in Russian and encouraging First Lady Melania Trump to work some Russian-made eco-fur into her wardrobe. There are ways we can try and encourage people to do different things https://t.co/4wii7tJhyv â€” Pamela Anderson (@pamfoundation) February 6, 2017 Advertisement
